seo.title: TinaCMS developer certifications
seo.description: Earn a TinaCMS Developer Credly Badge for LinkedIn. The badge shows that you're a TinaCMS certified developer!

features.headline: TinaCMS developer certifications
features.text: We encourage all developers to earn their TinaCMS developer certification by getting TinaCMS up and running and completing the basics before implementing TinaCMS. This is essential to prove that you can effectively use TinaCMS on a real project!

questions.question: Step 1
questions.answer:
Join Tina's Discord channel - You can leave a message on the 'introductions' channel:

* Hi, I am trying out TinaCMS with NextJS, Astro, etc. to build a blog, portfolio, documentation site, etc.
* Previous CMSs I have used include...

questions.question: Step 2
questions.answer:
Get TinaCMS running and deploy a site using [tina.io](https://tina.io) and [TinaCloud.](https://app.tina.io/signin)

* This can be a personal site or one youâ€™ve built for work

questions.question: Step 4
questions.answer:
Record a [Done Video](https://www.ssw.com.au/rules/record-a-quick-and-dirty-done-video/) explaining how Tina works. Use your device's screen recording tool or use [YakShaver](https://yakshaver.ai/). In your recording, explain to us:

* Explain editorial workflow
* Configure branch preview
* What is the cause of a schema mismatch error and how do you resolve it?
* Your tina /config file - what changes have you made and why?
* How can you improve the markdown capabilities of your site?
* Any feedback or suggestions you have from your initial tryout

Tip: Have a separate tab open for each answer

questions.question: Step 7
questions.answer:
Email us at [badge@tina.io](mailto\:badge@tina.io). Include links to:

* Your video
* Your social media posts (if applicable)

questions.question: Step 8
questions.answer: We will review your video and if successful, you will receive a badge from [Credly](https://info.credly.com/).

questions.question: Step 9
questions.answer: Accept and share the badge on LinkedIn.

questions.question: zzStep 5
questions.answer: Post the video to YouTube (or another video platform) - make sure that it is public.

questions.question: zzStep 6
questions.answer: Optional - Post your video on social media (e.g., LinkedIn, Discord, X...).
